section.heading: Cardiopulmonary resuscitation training and retraining for police departments in cities having a population of one million or more 1

content.p:
ยง 208-h. Cardiopulmonary resuscitation training and retraining for
police departments in cities having a population of one million or more
1. For the purposes of this section, "cardiopulmonary resuscitation"
shall have the same meaning as provided in subdivision six of section
six hundred twenty-one of the general business law.
 2. Every police department in a city having a population of one
million or more shall provide all uniformed personnel of such department
training in cardiopulmonary resuscitation and direct that such training
be completed at least every two years to the extent practicable, but no
later than every four years.
